item.title: [AMQ-3481] Possible Stomp deadlock
item.description: When subscribing with receipt to the queue that already contains the messages, we can end up dead locking sending ack back to the broker and response to the stomp client.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
